definition: warm/lukewarm/temperature/to warm up/mild/soft/tender/to review (a lesson etc)/fever (TCM)/old variant of 瘟[wen1]

sentences.english: Softly, deftly, music shall caress you…
sentences.chinese: 溫柔地，輕靈地，樂聲將把你撫慰。

sentences.english: In my view, a masculine man should be generous and brave as a feminine woman tender and considerate.
sentences.chinese: 男人味就是豁達勇敢，女人味就是溫柔體貼。

sentences.english: The meaning of vicious beauty can be sensed in this gentle smile.
sentences.chinese: 蛇蠍美人的含義，大概全在這溫柔的一笑中了。

sentences.english: Especially to their husbands, they should not only be gentilesse but also to obey.
sentences.chinese: 尤其對夫君不僅要溫柔，而且要三從四德。

sentences.english: Gently run your nose and lips over her shoulders and neck smelling her. Say "Mmmmm… you smell good."
sentences.chinese: 溫柔地讓你的鼻子和嘴脣滑過她的肩膀和脖子。

sentences.english: She should have known because Squeaker was gentle .
sentences.chinese: 她應該知道，因爲玩具是溫柔。

sentences.english: Don't fight not gentleness don't eosinophilic alcohol and tobacco, single good woman alone.
sentences.chinese: 不傾城不溫柔不嗜菸酒，單身隻身好女人。

sentences.english: He nudged her gently. She nuzzled him back.
sentences.chinese: 他向她溫柔地推了推，她用鼻子愛撫他，欲擒故縱。

sentences.english: Although it is a gentle and nice word, it represents a horrifying landscape.
sentences.chinese: 如此溫柔美好的名字，卻代表著一個駭人的驚心景觀。

sentences.english: This generous wine feels softer when paired with the Sautéed Rice with Seafood and Thailand Shrimp Paste.
sentences.chinese: 這慷慨的酒和泰式蝦膏海鮮炒飯搭配時顯得溫柔一些。

sentences.english: Her face should be treated with tenderness and reverence.
sentences.chinese: 請溫柔甚至帶着微微崇敬對待她的臉頰。

sentences.english: let him shew out of a good conversation his works with meekness of wisdom.
sentences.chinese: 他就當在智慧的溫柔上，顯出他的善行來。

sentences.english: Does legalisation make their punters more tender?
sentences.chinese: 合法化是否令她們的嫖客更溫柔？

sentences.english: Owing to the natural limit of the vocal cords, the roaring only betrays the gentility of the cat.
sentences.chinese: 也許是聲帶的天然性，怎麼聽都有貓的溫柔。

sentences.english: One day, forgiveness will tiptoe in and take up gentle occupancy in your heart.
sentences.chinese: 總有一天，寬容會悄悄地來，溫柔地入住你的心房。
春姑娘像一個溫柔的媽媽。

definition: to speak/to say/to talk/to gossip/to tell stories/talk/word
